attributes.action: To undertake an independent enquiry into the value to the UK econmy of defence exports before closing DESO.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The defence and aerospace industry is one of the few remaining UK sectors that creates high value manufactured exports.  The enormous spin off economic and technology benefits to the UK should be properly and publicly assessed before reacting to anti-arms export lobbyists and religious groups who wish to close DESO on emotional grounds, thereby damaging a valuable export industry.
